#include "Object.h"

Namespaces

namespace  Sylph
 The Sylph namespace contains everything in LibSylph.

Detailed Description

Include this file if you want your objects to be comparable with operator< ,….

It defines operator!=,operator>,operator<=, and operator >= in terms of operator== and operator<. Therefore, you'll only have to overload these in order to make your objects comparable.
